In a flashback to our days on the playground, a growing number of consumers are embracing the idea of sharing. People are sharing everything from apartments to designer dresses , and the surge in popularity has given rise to what has been called the “ sharing economy .” This movement is reshaping the way people are consuming, and disrupting many established industries in the process.
